files.description: Updated intake checklist that hard-requires verbatim claim text, dataset name+DOI/link (or fallback research area + 2 seed papers/authors), and context metadata (who/when/where) with explicit pass/fail criteria.
JSON Schema defining the machine-validated structure for claim cards including required claim text, provenance anchors, dataset metadata, and context fields with conditional fallback rules.

Command-line validator that loads claim card files and blocks work by failing with actionable errors when dataset/provenance anchors or context metadata are missing or invalid per schema and custom rules.
Utility functions for schema loading, JSON/YAML parsing, rich validation error formatting, and rule helpers for dataset/provenance anchor checks.
Human-readable description of the single dataset-verification pilot claim and the expected intake fields to demonstrate the new checklist requirements.
Single pilot claim card instance used for dataset-verification testing, containing verbatim claim text, dataset name with DOI/link (or fallback), and who/when/where context metadata.
Negative pilot claim card instance intentionally missing dataset/provenance anchors to ensure validation blocks work as required.
Pytest suite verifying that valid pilot claims pass and that missing dataset/provenance anchors or context metadata cause hard validation failures with specific error messages.
Project configuration specifying dependencies (jsonschema, pyyaml, pytest) and tool settings needed to run validation and tests reproducibly.

missionDescription: Update the intake checklist to hard-require: (a) verbatim claim text, (b) dataset name + DOI/link (or explicit fallback: research area + at least 2 seed papers/authors), (c) context metadata (who/when/where). Add validation rules that block work when dataset/provenance anchors are missing; then test on 1 dataset-verification pilot claim.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
